类 Note

java.lang.Object
org.kelvinizer.note.Note
所有已实现的接口:
Comparable<Note>
直接已知子类:
HoldNote, TapNote
public abstract class Note extends Object implements Comparable<Note>
Represents a note in the rhythm game, containing properties for movement, timing, and judgment. This class is abstract and serves as a base for various note types.

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型
    字段
    说明
    protected double
    actual_hit_time
    The actual hit time of the note, initialized to positive infinity.
    protected boolean
    is_sync
    Indicates if the note is synced.
    protected final int
    lane_num
    The lane number where the note is displayed.
    protected final MotionManager
    movement
    Manages the motion of the note within the game.
    protected final double
    perfect_hit_time
    The perfect hit time for the note.
    protected final double
    startTime
    The start time for the note.
    protected int
    status
    The status of the note, with a default value of 4 (inactive).

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Note

      public Note(int lane_num, double perfect_hit_time, double duration)
      Constructs a new note with the specified lane number, perfect hit time, and duration.
      参数:
      lane_num - The lane number where the note is displayed.
      perfect_hit_time - The time when the note is perfectly hit.
      duration - The duration the note lasts.

  • 方法详细资料

    • addMotion

      public void addMotion(Motion m)
      Adds motion to the note's movement manager.
      参数:
      m - The motion to be added to the movement manager.

    • isValidNote

      public boolean isValidNote()
      Checks if the note is valid based on its movement manager and other parameters.
      返回:
      True if the note is valid, false otherwise.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the note's status and hit time to their initial values.

    • sync

      public void sync()
      Syncs the note, marking it as synchronized.

    • getStatus

      public int getStatus()
      Gets the current status of the note.
      返回:
      The status of the note.

    • getLaneNum

      public int getLaneNum()
      Gets the lane number where the note is displayed.
      返回:
      The lane number of the note.

    • getStartTime

      public double getStartTime()
      Gets the start time for the note.
      返回:
      The start time of the note.

    • getStrikeTimeDifference

      public double getStrikeTimeDifference()
      Gets the difference between the perfect hit time and the actual hit time.
      返回:
      The difference between the perfect and actual hit times.

    • autoplay

      public void autoplay()
      Simulates autoplay behavior for the note based on the current game time.

    • toParticleRect

      public CRect toParticleRect()
      Creates a particle rectangle representing the note for the current time.
      返回:
      A CRect representing the note particle.

    • getBottomRect

      protected CRect getBottomRect(Color fillColor)
      Creates the bottom rectangular representation of the note with a given fill color. The color is adjusted for alpha transparency based on the current time and perfect hit time.
      参数:
      fillColor - The color used to fill the bottom rectangle.
      返回:
      A CRect representing the bottom of the note with appropriate fill and outline color.

    • toBottomRect

      public abstract CRect toBottomRect()
      Abstract method to create the bottom rectangle for the specific type of note.
      返回:
      A CRect representing the bottom of the note.

    • judge

      public abstract void judge(int signal)
      Abstract method to judge the note's status based on a given signal.
      参数:
      signal - The signal indicating how the note should be judged.

    • isActive

      public abstract boolean isActive()
      Abstract method to check if the note is currently active.
      返回:
      True if the note is active, false otherwise.

    • hasRect

      public abstract boolean hasRect()
      Abstract method to check if the note has a rectangular shape.
      返回:
      True if the note has a rectangle, false otherwise.

    • hasParticle

      public abstract boolean hasParticle()
      Abstract method to check if the note has a particle effect.
      返回:
      True if the note has a particle effect, false otherwise.

    • visibilityStatus

      public abstract int visibilityStatus()
      Abstract method to determine the visibility status of the note.
      返回:
      An integer representing the visibility status of the note.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Note n)
      Compares this note with another note to determine if they are equal. Two notes are considered equal if they have the same perfect hit time.
      参数:
      n - The note to compare this note to.
      返回:
      true if the notes have the same perfect hit time; false otherwise.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Note n)
      Compares this note to another note based on the perfect hit time.
      指定者:
      compareTo 在接口中 Comparable<Note>
      参数:
      n - The note to be compared.
      返回:
      A negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this note's perfect hit time is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified note's perfect hit time.

    • getTotalMovementTime

      public double getTotalMovementTime()
      Gets the total movement time of the note.
      返回:
      The total duration of the note's movement.
